remarks.text: Tram M4, M5: Replacement service due to construction works between Mollstraße/Otto-Braun-Straße and S Hackescher Markt.
Bus M4, M5, N40: The stop S+U Alexanderplatz/Memhardstraße towards S Karlshorst has been moved 20 meters in the driving direction. [KARTE/MAP] (valid at: S+U Alexanderplatz Bhf/Memhardstr. (Berlin))
